hdlc.description: Describe the parameters to be configured

keepalive.description: Use to specify the keepalive timeout value

bidirection-mode.description:
Set the bidirection mode:
loose:loose mode-0
strict:strict mode-1
expand:expand mode-2

lb.description:
Set the MHDLC load-balance
per-destination,MHDLC load balance by destination
per-packet,MHDLC load balance by packet

active-num.description: Set the MHDLC active number. Its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.

groupid.description: The posgroup id, its maximum value depends on the performance parameters.
